product_name: Menasha Ridge Press Five Star Trails in the Adirondacks
long_description: Check out 40 of the region's most beautiful hikes in. Author: Tim Starmer. Softcover; 208 pages; black-and-white photographs and maps. Menasha Ridge Press; copyright 2010. Includes trail maps with elevation profiles and GPS coordinates, and detailed directions to the trailheads. Includes ratings for difficulty, scenery, trail conditions, solitude and accessibility for children. .
short_description: Check out 40 of the region's most beautiful hikes in Five Star Trails in the Adirondacks .
